content: I think I'll go with the Iced Tea with Fresh Mint. It's a classic and easy to make. By the way, I've been doing some small acts of kindness lately, and it feels great to give back to those around me. Like when I spent $50 on groceries for my neighbor at Trader Joe's, getting her milk, eggs, bread, and some fresh produce. It was a small gesture, but it made a big difference to her.
